title: Stereo Visual SLAM on KITTI Dataset
description: Implemented a stereo visual odometry pipeline using KITTI dataset. Extracted feature correspondences, estimated depth, recovered camera pose, and evaluated trajectory accuracy using ground-truth data.

title: Autonomous Navigation using Reinforcement Learning
description: Built an autonomous navigation system using reinforcement learning where the agent learns obstacle avoidance and goal-directed navigation through reward-based optimization.

title: Smart Irrigation System (IoT)
description: Designed an automated irrigation system using sensors and microcontrollers to monitor soil moisture and intelligently control water flow for efficient agriculture.

title: Liver Tumor Segmentation using Deep Learning
description: Developed a deep learning-based medical image segmentation model to detect liver tumors from CT scans. Evaluated predictions against ground truth masks using Dice coefficient.

title: Boom & Arm Offset Verification (ROS 2)
description: ROS 2 package for offline verification of excavator boom and arm joint angles using AprilTag-based vision. Processes recorded ROS 2 bag files to compute yaw offsets from visual fiducials and compares them against joint encoder values. Includes live visualization, CSV logging, and automatic plotting for calibration analysis.
